[@kik](@DJVbfRTEhC3cH1zU5/BAx6MgKIX1fkkytaRziA10suw=.ed25519) 

Thanks! It's great to hear that your sbot is so resilient, although I can't think of anything that would provide more info on *why* it isn't failing. I'll let you know if I think of anything clever, thanks again!

[@صفر](@uR5GhJwABZuZwhy9mI2hFYkTP0IMRG2LZkqpTkgcR1g=.ed25519) 

Could you verify which version of Patchbay you're using? Latest is currently f0eae06e2b551bf5a55dae3e8509e1b5308cfbf4 for me.
